item.title: AGO2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g069260 Gene Symbol: AGO2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: AGO2a but not AGO2b mediates antiviral defense against infection of wild-type cucumber mosaic virus in tomato.
